授業目的: With today's technology, companies are able to collect tremendous amount of data with relative ease.  However, the data are usually meaningless unless they are analyzed for trends, patterns, relationships and other useful information.  This course offers experience for students in a practical way a variety of methods, from simple to complex, trying to solve business problems with spreadsheets to make a good decision.
到達目標: Students who major in marketing, finance, management and/or global public management will be able to understand hands-on, example-based approach and fundamental concepts, to describe and analyze data and make quantitative-based decisions in business environments.  Students are able to create business case platforms on spreadsheets and solve problems using MS Excel tools, solver, simulation and function keys.
授業方法: For the first two weeks, we provide the course online by Zoom.  After that, we will do face-to-face along with online by Zoom.
